thread.title: Top 10 worst metro areas for mobile performance

title: Top 10 worst metro areas for mobile performance
text:
22 Top 10 worst metro areas for mobile performance 
American City & County: These cities were determined to be the top 10 worst metro areas for mobile performance by RootMetrics, a mobile network ranking service. In total, 125 metro areas were measured across six categories: Overall performance, network speed, network reliability, data performance, call performance and text performance.
